price: በእውነቱ (ከሓዲዎች) ልቦቻቸው ከዚያ (መጽሐፍ) በዝንጋቴ ውስጥ ናቸው፡፡ ለእነሱም ከዚህ ሌላ እነሱ ለርሷ ሠሪዎችዋ የኾኑ (መጥፎ) ሥራዎች አሏቸው፡፡
arabic: بَلۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡ فِي غَمۡرَةٖ مِّنۡ هَٰذَا وَلَهُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلٞ مِّن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ هُمۡ لَهَا عَٰمِلُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: bal qulūbuhum fī ghamratin min hādhā walahum aʿmālun min dūni dhālika hum lahā ʿāmilūna
